spots.name: China Courts
spots.description: Wooden ledges and other makeshift doo-dads that make for a good session.  Located on a basketball court so be respectful of those utilizing the courts for its intended purpose.

spots.name: Texas Beach
spots.description: Well-poured concrete with a healthy dose of both tranny and street obstacles.  This spot is a haven for the locals so respect the space and cleanup after yourself.
